#summary Copies the selected code in to a comment above the selection to remind you what the code looked like.

[http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/wiki/Feedback  http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/Feedback.png]
===== Requires DXCore 10.2 since build 1742=====
=== Introduction ===

Introduces a new action *!ReviseSelection* which copies any selected code into a comment immediately above the selection, to remind you of what the code used to look like.

=== Configuration ===

 * [http://community.devexpress.com/blogs/rorybecker/archive/2010/10/05/binding-keys-in-coderush.aspx Bind a key] to the *!ReviseSelection* action

=== Usage ===

 * Highlight code 
 * Trigger *!ReviseSelection* using the key bound in configuration

=== Notes ===
